profile_summary: As a Senior Software Engineer with over 8 years of experience, I excel in **Python** and have a strong foundation in **Go**, **Java**, and modern software development practices. My expertise includes utilizing containers and orchestration with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, and driving efficiencies through **Infrastructure-as-Code** strategies. I am adept at designing **event-driven architecture** and implementing complex **ETL** processes while employing **message queuing** systems for optimal data handling. With solid skills in data correlation and complex relationship modeling, I efficiently manage **Graph databases** and leverage technologies such as **CEL** and **JSONPath**. I also have experience with **GenAI** and **LLM**, enhancing development processes through AI-assisted coding. Alongside my core competencies, I specialize in crafting high-performance solutions in diverse sectors, leveraging tools like **FastAPI**, **Django**, and cloud services such as **AWS** and **Azure**. My commitment to best practices in **microservices architecture** and API development ensures the delivery of secure and efficient applications that align with business goals.
